price: 46. (Allah) alobi: Bobanga te, ya sólo nazali elongo na bino, nazali koyoka mpe kornona.
arabic: قَالَ لَا تَخَافَآۖ إِنَّنِي مَعَكُمَآ أَسۡمَعُ وَأَرَىٰ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qāla lā takhāfā innanī maʿakumā asmaʿu wa-arā
